RTCDTMFSender.summary: The RTCDTMFSender interface provides a mechanism for transmitting DTMF codes on a WebRTC . You gain access to the connection's RTCDTMFSender through the property on the audio track you wish to send DTMF with.

remarks.para: The primary purpose for WebRTC's DTMF support is to allow WebRTC-based communication clients to be connected to a public-switched telephone network (PSTN) or other legacy telephone service, including extant voice over IP (VoIP) services. For that reason, DTMF can't be used between two WebRTC-based devices, because there is no mechanism provided by WebRTC for receiving DTMF codes.
